Class SimInterface

java.lang.Object
  SimInterface
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class SimInterface
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

SimInterface - simulation interface object for simulator MiniSim. Independent demo applet version, no networking in this one. See the MiniSim description for more info. Written by Andy Ganse, Applied Physics Lab, University of Washington, copyright 1999 by UW.

See Also:
MiniSim
